title: Teotihuacan
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 501 words, Level L (Grade 2), Lexile 580L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     U and Z1
description: The ruins of Teotihuacán include the stone walls of temples and large pyramids. This ancient city in Mexico has been of great interest to many for centuries. However, the people who built the city are still a mystery. Students will enjoy learning about the history of this amazing place and the discoveries that have been made there.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
